00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00163 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00164     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)

00166 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00167     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))

00176     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00178 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00179     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00287 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00288 {
00289     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00290     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00291 }
00292 
00293 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00294 {
00295     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00296         pod->minpri + incr :
00297         pod->minpri - incr;
00298 }
00299 
00300 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00301 {
00302     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00303         pod->maxpri - incr :
00304         pod->maxpri + incr;
00305 }
00306 
00307 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio (int inprio, int outprio)
00308 {
00309     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00310        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00311     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00312     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00313 }
00314 
00315 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio (int prio)
00316 {
00317     return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00318         nkpod->minpri - prio :
00319         nkpod->maxpri - prio - 1;
00320 }
00321 
00322 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00323 {
00324     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00325     spl_t s;
00326 
00327     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00328     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00329     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00330     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00331     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00332 }
00333 
00334     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00335 
00336 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00337     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00338 
00339 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00340     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00341 
00342 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00343     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00344 
00345 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00346     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00347 
00348 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00349     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00350 
00351 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00352     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00353 
00354 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00355     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00356 
00357 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00358     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00359 
00360 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00361     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00362 
00363 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00364     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00365 
00366 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00367     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00368 
00369 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00370     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00371 
00372 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00373     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00374 
00375 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00376     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00377 
00378 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00379     (xnpod_root_p())
00380 
00381 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00382 
00383 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00384     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00386 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void)
00387 {
00388     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00389 }
00390 
00391 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00392 {
00393     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00394     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00395 }
00396 
00397 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00398 {
00399     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00400 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00401     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00402 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00403     return ticks;
00404 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00405 }
00406 
00407 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00408 {
00409 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00410     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00411 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00412     return t;
00413 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00414 }

00472 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00473 {
00474     spl_t s;
00475 
00476     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00477 
00478     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00479         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00480 
00481     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00482 }
00483 
00484 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00485 {
00486     spl_t s;
00487 
00488     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00489 
00490     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00491         {
00492         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00493         xnpod_schedule();
00494         }
00495 
00496     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00497 }

00528 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00529 {
00530     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00531     xnpod_schedule();
00532 }

00534 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout)
00535 {
00536     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00537 }

00539 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void)
00540 {
00541     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00542 }
00543 
00544 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void)
00545 {
00546     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
